Header.title: TeamBelar
Header.paragraph: The technology you use impresses no one. The experience you create with it is everything.

About.paragraph: Throughout my life I have been interested in both Technology and Business and how the two interact with each other. Because of this, my passions include Integration, specifically integrating together applications that wouldn't natively communicate, Data Management, and Software Development. My goal is to utilize technology to innovate new and better products for business application either internally or for clients. I believe mentorship is pivotol for the next generation of engineers & developers. Leading effectively & prioritizing ownership when possible is necessary for a strong team.

Accomplishments.name: Data Integrations
Accomplishments.text: I designed and developed a DataBroker platform to facilitate data exchange between systems without native integration, originally built on AWS using Lambda, API Gateway, CloudWatch, EventBridge, and Cognito for secure, scalable infrastructure. As business needs evolved, I refactored the platform into ASP.NET, transitioning from Node.js to C# in a complete redevelopment known as FMS:Connect, focusing on performance, maintainability, and streamlined API integration.

Accomplishments.name: Custom Homepage Builders
Accomplishments.text: I originally developed AMSDynamix, a configurable homepage builder designed to enhance user experience through dynamic content management, customizable search results, and role-based visibility. The platform offers a vast library of widgets and icons, real-time charting, and flexible reporting tools, empowering users to create informative, visually engaging dashboards tailored to their needs.

Accomplishments.name: Conference Presentations
Accomplishments.text: I had the incredible opportunity to present at Building Insights - 2024, a milestone I have long aspired to achieve. I delivered a presentation on FMS:Connect showcasing its capabilities in integrating systems and streamlining data exchange within the facilities management industry. I also participated in an open forum discussion alongside industry leaders, engaging directly with prominent clients to address questions about FMS:Workplace (an IWMS).

Accomplishments.name: Infrastructure Management & Engineering
Accomplishments.text: I manage the stability and security of company infrastructure while balancing daily development responsibilities, ensuring systems remain reliable and secure. My expertise includes setting up and maintaining Azure and EntraID, leveraging AWS Lambda for cloud functions and scheduling tasks, and overseeing virtual machines (VMs) for internal operations. I also manage static IP configurations, DNS services, and ensure proper access controls across all environments to maintain operational integrity.

Accomplishments.name: AI & LLM Utilization
Accomplishments.text: I leverage OpenAI's large language models (LLMs) to develop advanced AI-driven tools and services, including direct integration with BelarWeather, a React Native app I developed for friends and family (and their extended friends) in my town's immediate area. Beyond implementation, I have guided teams in effectively utilizing OpenAIâ€™s capabilities to create industry-leading chat services while ensuring robust security measures to protect sensitive data and maintain compliance.

Accomplishments.name: Communication, Mentoring, & Management
Accomplishments.text: I currently lead, mentor, and manage a highly skilled team of developers and application architects. I work to gather business requirements and translate them into actionable tasks for my team. Committed to mentorship, I prioritize empowering the next generation of engineers by balancing technical guidance with professional development. My communication style adapts to the audience, whether simplifying complex concepts for business stakeholders or engaging in in-depth technical discussions with development teams.
